nodes.text: Kalandra was one of Chelli Lona Aphra's lovers while they both attended the University of Bar'leth. When she began waiting outside during Aphra's classes for Aphra to emerge, Aphra started avoiding her as she was not interested in having a stalker. Sana Starros asked Aphra about Kalandra, aware that the two had been seeing each other before she and Aphra began a relationship, but Aphra explained to Starros that she was no longer seeing anyone else.
